New_Haven.Elizabeth R. Hooker House: The Elizabeth R. Hooker House is a historic house at 123 Edgehill Road in New Haven, Connecticut. It is a 1-1/2 story brick English-style Arts and Crafts suburban villa designed by Delano and Aldrich and built in 1914 for Elizabeth R. Hooker. Hooker was a 20th-century progressive activist, scholar, and writer in areas such as women's rights, public health care, and historic preservation.
